title: Client bugging out
body:
Hey,
for the last three games my game has been bugging out on me. Champions move slowly and then suddenly speed up and teleport to where they were supposed to be normally. The time is bugging out too, sometimes the seconds go slower which makes for example the jungle creeps spawn at about 1.30.

Tried repairing the client but it didn't help, what can I do to fix it?

replies.body:
It sounds like your connection to the game server may be unstable. We typically see this happen when there are issues with a local network configuration that prevents a solid link from being established. To ensure this is not the case, I encourage you to work through the steps in our [connection troubleshooting guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if you continue to see this issue after working through those steps.
